revision.comment: Omega moved page [[MangoPi-R3]] to [[MangoPi R3]] without leaving a redirect: fixed ;
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=MangoPi |model=MPi-R3 |revision=(Ver.C) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Widora |price=16 |est_release_date=10/2021 |type=development board, single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=F1C200s |cpu1_cspeed=420 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD5F1GQ5UEY1G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Allwinner |ram1_model=F1C200s |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, console port,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1) |eth_none=true |flags=Micro SD Card slot, DVP Camera interface, microphone, amplifier, RGB LCD FPC, SPI, I2C, SDIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2020.07; |stock_os=Linux;5.4.66; |default_ip=192.168.9.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=dfrobot }} {{TagLine|MangoPi-R3 Development Board}} :[https://mangopi.cc/mangopi_r Product page] {{•}} [https://wiki.dfrobot.com/MangoPi_R3_SKU_DFR0780 Support page]
"MangoPi-R3 Ver:C", "MANGOPI", and "20211031" are silkscreened on the board top. :"mangopi.org" is silkscreened on the board bottom.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/02/03/more-allwinner-f1c200s-arm9-boards-mangopi-r3-and-cherrypi-f1c200s/ ''More Allwinner F1C200s ARM9 boards: MangoPi R3 and CherryPi-F1C200S'' on '''CNX-Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] F1C200s @420MHz (ARM926EJS) *Memory: 64MB (DDR SIP) RAM *Storage: 128MB (SPI NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *USB: 1x Micro USB 2.0 (OTG) port *Power: 5V via Micro USB port
===See also=== :;[[MangoPi]] • [[List of SBCs]] • [[Allwinner]] *[[MangoPi MQ]] • [https://github.com/mangopi-sbc/MQ Spec.] *[[MangoPi MQ Dual]] (MPi-MQ1DW) • [https://mangopi.cc/mangopi_mqdual PPage] *[[MangoPi MQ Quad]] • [https://habr.com/ru/post/686520/ Spec.] *[[MangoPi MQ Pro]] (MPi-MQ1LH/PH) • [https://mangopi.cc/mangopi_mqpro PPage] *[[MangoPi MCore H616]] • [https://habr.com/ru/post/686520/ Spec.] *[[MangoPi R3]] (MPi-R3C) • [https://mangopi.cc/mangopi_r PPage]
==Images== <gallery> File:MangoPi-R3 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:MangoPi-R3 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
